TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CheckedListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

summary.span: Displays a in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.

span.span: Displays a in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控制項會顯示使用者可以使用瀏覽鍵盤或捲軸控制項右邊的項目清單。This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control. 使用者可以將核取記號放一個或多個項目和選取的項目可以使用巡覽和。The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the and . 若要加入至清單的物件，在執行階段，請將指派的物件參考的陣列方法。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然後，清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 您可以將個別項目加入清單方法。You can add individual items to the list with the method. 物件支援透過三種狀態列舉型別： ， ，和。The object supports three states through the enumeration: , , and . 您必須設定的狀態程式碼中的使用者介面，因為不提供一個機制來執行這項操作。You must set the state of in the code because the user interface for a does not provide a mechanism to do so. 如果已`true`，則辨認與擴充項目的文字，建立資料行中的定位點字元。If is `true`, the will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns. 這些定位停駐點預設值，且無法變更。These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed. 若要使用自訂的定位停駐點，將要`false`，將要`true`，並新增自訂值，以集合。To use custom tab stops, set to `false`, set to `true`, and add the custom values to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性是`false`，則屬性會被忽略，並取代標準索引標籤的位移。If the property is `false`, the property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets. 類別支援下列三個索引的集合：The class supports the following three indexed collections: |集合Collection|封裝的類別Encapsulating Class| |----------------|-------------------------| |中包含的所有項目控制項。All items contained in the control.|| |已選取的項目 （包括處於不定狀態的項目），其子集的項目包含在控制項。Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the control.|| |已選取索引，這是索引的項目集合的子集。Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection. 這些索引會指定項目處於已核取或不定狀態。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.|| 下列三個資料表是三個索引集合的範例，類別支援。The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the class supports. 第一個資料表會提供範例的控制項 （控制項中包含的所有項目） 中的項目索引的集合。The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|項目Item|核取狀態Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|物件 1Object 1|| |11|物件 2Object 2|| |22|物件 3Object 3|| |33|物件 4Object 4|| |44|物件 5Object 5|| 第二個資料表會提供選取項目的索引集合的範例。The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|項目Item| |-----------|----------| |00|物件 2Object 2| |11|物件 4Object 4| |22|物件 5Object 5| 第三個資料表會提供選取項目的索引的索引集合的範例。The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |索引Index|項目的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用方法、 屬性和集合的。The following example illustrates how you can use the methods, properties, and collections of a . 這是完整的範例準備好要執行之後，您必須將它複製到您的專案。This is a complete sample ready to run once you have copied it to your project. 您可以檢查和取消選取項目、 使用文字方塊來加入項目和一次您按下儲存 按鈕，請清除選取的項目。You can check and uncheck items, use the text box to add items and once you have clicked the save button, clear the checked items. [!code-cpp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已選取索引的集合是索引中的所有項目集合內的子集控制項。The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 這些索引會指定項目處於已核取或不定狀態。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在選取的項目以查看 內容檢查狀態項目中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 此範例示範如何使用屬性來取得，而屬性來取得。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一個迴圈會使用方法來取得的每個已檢查的項目，指定之項目的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二個迴圈也會使用，但使用方法來擷取項目的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: Collection of checked items in this .

The collection for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是中的物件子集集合，表示只有項目，其是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only those items whose is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`. 在此集合中的索引是以遞增順序。The indexes in this collection are in ascending order. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在選取的項目以查看 內容檢查狀態項目中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 此範例示範如何使用屬性來取得，而屬性來取得。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一個迴圈會使用方法來取得的每個已檢查的項目，指定之項目的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二個迴圈也會使用，但使用方法來擷取項目的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. 若要執行此範例中，執行下列步驟：To run this example, perform the following steps: 1. 新建 Windows Forms 應用程式Create a new Windows Forms application. 2. 新增和至表單。Add a and a to the form. 3. 將按鈕`WhatIsChecked`，新增的處理常式其事件，並複製下列處理常式的主體中的程式碼。Name the button `WhatIsChecked`, add a handler for its event, and copy in the code from the body of the following handler. 4. 將一些項目加入。Add some items to the . 5. 執行範例，並檢查一些在清單方塊中的核取方塊。Run the example and check some of the check boxes in the list box. 6. 按一下按鈕。Click the button. 您會看到一系列的訊息方塊，指出已檢查的項目。You will see a series of message boxes that indicate which items were checked. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.

value.span: 如果核取記號會立即; 套用否則， 。

span.span: if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示選取的項目時，是否應該切換核取方塊。 indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected. 預設行為是要變更選取項目上按第一次，然後再按一次套用核取記號的使用者。The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark. 在某些情況下，不過，您可能會偏好已經選取項目只要按下時。In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項，藉由設定， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 範例會填入控制項和 sets到控制項的屬性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含名為`CheckedListBox1`，並呼叫`InitializeCheckListBox`從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式，因此它只表示按一下已發生。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更特定的滑鼠資訊 （例如按鈕，按下滑鼠，滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用並傳遞的事件事件處理常式。If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the and events, which pass a to the event handler. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以調整，可以按兩下滑鼠按鈕的期間，按下之間經過時間的量。The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button. 每次使用者按兩下控制項，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control. 例如，如果您有事件處理方法和事件的表單中，按兩下表單時，會呼叫這兩個事件處理方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event-handling methods for the and events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called. 如果使用者按兩下不支援的控制項事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#157)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#157)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定屬性，您必須加入的參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

span.para: 當覆寫在衍生類別中，您不應該呼叫基底類別的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性應該不會覆寫和用來調整您的衍生控制項的屬性。The property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control. 這類的屬性， ，並應該由您的控制項中的對應屬性這類設定，和。Properties such as the , , and should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as , and . 應該只在您包裝標準的 Windows 控制項類別，或設定樣式 Windows Form 命名空間所未提供時才擴充。The should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace. 如需建立控制項參數的詳細資訊，請參閱`CreateWindow`並`CreateWindowEx`函式和`CREATESTRUCT`結構在 Windows 平台 SDK 參考中的文件位於 MSDN Library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會延伸屬性衍生的類別。The following code example extends the property of a derived class. 屬性變更，這會讓按鈕顯示而不是。The property is changed, which causes the button to display an rather than an . 此範例中，您需要的類別，繼承自類別。This example requires that you have a class that inherits from the class. [!code-cpp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#3)]

When overriding the property in a derived class, use the base class's property to extend the base implementation. Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設顯示它所包含的項目的預設字串。By default the displays the default string for the items it contains. 不過，可以顯示不同類型的物件，而且您可能想要變更顯示的字串指定屬性。However, the can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the property. 如果指定的屬性不存在，或值屬性為空字串 ("")，物件的結果方法會改為顯示。If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's method are displayed instead. 如果新值無法進行設定，系統會維護上一個值。If the new value of the cannot be set, the previous value is maintained. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項，藉由設定， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 範例會填入控制項和 sets到控制項的屬性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含名為`CheckedListBox1`，並呼叫`InitializeCheckListBox`從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由描繪。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 引發事件時，才屬性設定為或。The event is raised only when the property is set to or . 您可以使用這個事件來執行來繪製項目所需的工作。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果您有可變大小的項目 (也就是設定為)，則繪製項目之前，就會引發事件。If you have a variable-sized item (that is, is set to ), the event is raised before the item is drawn. 您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以指定要繪製在事件處理常式中的項目大小事件。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 這個事件與這個類別無關。This event is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法讓您能夠取得的項目，並透過給定的索引值。The method provides the ability to get the value of an item, given the index. 如果您絕對不要將某個項目的核取狀態`Indeterminate`，然後使用方法。If you never set the check state of an item to `Indeterminate`, then use the method. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在選取的項目以查看 內容檢查狀態項目中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 此範例示範如何使用方法來設定項目的核取狀態。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來取得並屬性來取得。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the and the property to get the . 第一個迴圈會使用方法來取得的每個已檢查的項目，指定之項目的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二個迴圈也會使用，但使用方法來擷取項目的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取狀態才會更新之後就會發生事件。The check state is not updated until after the event occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個度量單位為基礎的字型高度加上邊界提供項目周圍的空白字元。This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item. 擴充項的"g"和"y"之類的字元不會正確顯示 9.75 點新細明體字型變更時。The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial. 若要修正此問題，衍生的類別，從，並覆寫返回`base.ItemHeight+2`。To correct this, derive a class from and override to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您取得目前儲存在中的項目清單的參考控制項。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a control. 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 如需有關可使用的項目集合執行的工作的詳細資訊，請參閱類別參考主題。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在選取的項目以查看 內容檢查狀態項目中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 此範例會使用屬性來取得來擷取項目使用的索引方法。The example uses the property to get the to retrieve the index of an item using the method. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來取得，而屬性來取得。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一個迴圈會使用方法來取得的每個已檢查的項目，指定之項目的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二個迴圈也會使用，但使用方法來擷取項目的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法選取或清除核取方塊，按下的項目。The method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked. 如果屬性設定為`true`，從所選取或清除狀態的第一個時間按一下項目切換核取方塊。If the property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked. 否則為已選取的項目時，才可以切換核取方塊。Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否可以選取清單方塊中的一個項目，或可以選取任何項目。The property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected. 針對物件時，不支援多個選取項目。For objects, multiple selection is not supported. 您可以將模式設定為一個項目或沒有項目中。You can set the mode to one item or no items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化藉由設定控制以便在清單中選取一個項目。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the to allow one item in the list to be selected. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含名為`CheckedListBox1`，並呼叫`InitializeCheckListBox`從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值時`true`傳遞，則這個方法會設定值`Checked`。When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the value to `Checked`. 值為`false`設定至`Unchecked`。A value of `false` sets to `Unchecked`. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉中的項目和檢查清單中的項目。The following example enumerates the items in the and checks every other item in the list. 此範例示範如何使用和方法，將設定項目的核取狀態。The example demonstrates using the and methods to set the check state of an item. 要檢查，每一個其他項目呼叫以設定要`Indeterminate`，而已檢查的狀態設定為其他項目上呼叫`Checked`。For every other item that is to be checked, is called to set the to `Indeterminate`, while is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來取得若要取得的項目。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the to get the of items. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 其項目設為`Indeterminate`中核取記號 核取方塊，會出現，但是方塊會呈現灰色，表示已檢查的項目不定狀態。Items whose is set to `Indeterminate` appear with a check mark in the check box, but the box is grayed to indicate the indeterminate status of the checked item. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉中的項目和檢查清單中的項目。The following example enumerates the items in the and checks every other item in the list. 此範例示範如何使用和方法，將設定項目的核取狀態。The example demonstrates using the and methods to set the check state of an item. 要檢查，每一個其他項目呼叫以設定要`Indeterminate`，而已檢查的狀態設定為其他項目上呼叫`Checked`。For every other item that is to be checked, is called to set the to `Indeterminate`, while is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來取得若要取得的項目。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the to get the of items. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項，藉由設定， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 範例會填入控制項和 sets到控制項的屬性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含名為`CheckedListBox1`，並呼叫`InitializeCheckListBox`從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版中的相容性的文字呈現。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性要提供視覺化的相容性，Windows Form 控制項之間呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂的文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式不從正在升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或是[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中導入[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了改善效能，讓文字看起來好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，則[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字呈現。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距] 和 [自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容情況，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性設`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`要`true`針對應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫方法的參數`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. WM_ACTIVATEAPP 作業系統訊息會在此範例中得知另一個應用程式會變成作用中處理。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 位於 MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 文件參考是指http://msdn.microsoft.com/library若要了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 實際的常值可在 Windows.h 標頭檔包含在平台 SDK （Core SDK 一節） 下載中，位於 MSDN Library，還有http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]
